Reviews.Content: Never again We stayed in Dewi Sri only because our dive shop operator included it as part of the dive package. I guess this is because its cheap and this is reflected in the quality of the rooms.When we first checked in, we were put in a ground floor room. The room is small and the toilet is dirty. The door to the toilet is not painted and it looks unfinished. The toilet bowl is dirty and the sink wouldnt drain. Worse, the water from the tap is grey/brownish. Only water from the basin is dirty, but the shower is OK. Whats more, the room is infested with mosquitoes. We killed about 8 but more kept coming. We asked for mosquito coils but they dont have that so they gave us insecticide instead. The mosquitoes were coming in from a gap under the door so we stuffed it with towels and sprayed insecticide on it and the mosquito problem stopped.The only redeeming factor of this place are the friendly staffs, but it couldnt make up for the awful 2 days we spend here.For this price, I believe there are better options around and I will definitely give Dewi Sri a miss the next time I am in Bali and I would not recommend it to anyone.
Reviews.Author: brokenonends

Reviews.Content: rough diamond Stayed with daughter and granddaughter in June, nice grounds large pool but in need of some TLC. Our room was in the old section, small but functional. The bathroom had a bath which was used regularly however the bathroom sink was leaking due to a crack in the basin. Great location close to shops and night clubs, hated the walk to the beach, too many shop, hated having to say no all the way to the beach.
Reviews.Author: emeraldbythesea

Reviews.Content: Good value, very basic       Grounds of Dewi Sri Hotel
Reviews.Author: Ddkent

Reviews.Content: Moved to another hotel after one night What a different a year makes. I wrote a positive review after visiting this hotel last year and so much so that I made another reservation on my recent trip. Well, this time wasnt so pleasant. The room they put me in was very dirty. I thought I could stick it out but after finding out my tub wasnt draining at all, I just could not bear it anymore. I could have asked for another room but I could not stomach what I already experienced. I guess with this hotel, it is hit and miss depending on what room they put you in. While I was checking out after one night of stay, there was a someome from Sweden complaining about not having any hot water. The staff told her to leave the water on for 10 minutes. I am not sure about you, but no hotel is cheap enough for me to leave the water on for 10 minutes in order to get hot water.
Reviews.Author: chungt79

Reviews.Content: Dewi Sri makes Bali Bagus Fourth time back at Dewi Sri. Booked a Family Room as Compared to many Hotels these are clean spacious and roomy, with privicy from the children with a screen door. The service from staff was exceptional, as it always is. This may still be a 3 star hotel but comes with 5 star service and for someone who wants a quiet hotel in busy Kuta I would recommend this one.
Reviews.Author: SunTrecker

Reviews.Content: just fine but old facility.. stay with whole family members here for xmas holiday... i made a reservation long before just for secure that we got a rooms! we booked for 1 family room+2 standard cost about USD 120.00 pernite.. but we got the room which is location far each others!!it was rainy seasons, no umbrella for guest, the roof was licking.. and my bed so damed wet seriously! we move to other room on the last nite we stay.. after request.food was okay, the hotel atmosphere was fine for family holiday.. only need more attention frm the management specially for the structure of the building!
Reviews.Author: wuri

Reviews.Content: Good for family or first timer. This hotel is fine and would be most suited to families, people who want to be in the centre of Kuta or first time travellers to Bali. It's clean and safe with a nice family atmosphere. It's nothing special but a good budget choice. As others said the breakfast is pretty basic, but it's fine. We payed one of the hotel workers to look after our son for a few hours while we went out for dinner, which was handy. The staff are very friendly and it really is in a great position if you like to be near shops, cafes and nightlife, but want a peaceful place to sleep.
Reviews.Author: indo-mie

Reviews.Content: so so Nice staff and pool but we wern't impressed with the food. The breakfast in particular lacked variety and everything was laced with hot chilli, great if you are used to spicy food for breakfast but not suitable for most children. Getting a soft boiled egg that didn't have clear egg white was also a hit and miss affair! The TV channels are all Indonesian language but I guess you don't travel to watch television. Definitely a budget hotel and just somewhere to sleep and keep your clothes.
Reviews.Author: Franni1

Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel for everybody Just back from the 3D2N bali trip over there, I was really impressed by the excellent service of the staffs there. Althought the hotel is not 4 or 5 star hotel, still, the friendliness, the personality service from the staff and the well location really worth for any of you to go and try.The 1st day when we checked in, quite surprise that the front desk staffs, Agung and the other male colleague, could speak very fluent english. And, after we saw the room and requested to change (due to the location), still, they were so kind to change for us immediately. (even though, at last, we still choose the first room that they reserved for us, ha..) And, on the 2nd day night, we decided to go and see the sunrise on the next day morning. Agung, so kind of him to arrange for us to go by the hotel transport in the early morning, 4.50am, drived by his the other male colleague (Of course, we got to pay a bit, but, we were so happy for it...) and we were really impressed for all the excellent service that they provided. Especially, when we were about to checked out, busied for shooting photo for each other, the staffs there were volunteer to take photo for two of us. it was not only one staff there, about all the staffs who passed by, were volunteer to help us. If you happen to stay there, feel free to send my regards to Agung and his male colleague there. I am so great that i choose such a good hotel!!!
Reviews.Author: dorisSingapore

Reviews.Content: Little gem in the heart of Kuta       View of the hotel on the third floor.
Reviews.Author: Cracklin_Travel_Pig

Reviews.Content: best service in bali Hi i would just like to comment on what i read about dewi sri cottages, i have been to bali 5 times in the last year and have booked again to leave 26/10, each time i go i wouldn't stay anywhere else but the Dewi Sri, the peace and tranquility of the place attracted me but also the rooms are spotless, the staff are so friendly and helpful, i feel like it is my second home, for the price you pay compared with some this is an excellent hotel, it is so handy to everything but once you leave the hustle bustle of legian street and walk up the laneway it is like walking into paradise, the gardens are absolutely beautiful and many a night instead of going out i just invite my friends around and sit at one of the many large tables (with umbrella's) and the sound of the little fountains running, under the palm trees, and sink into my own world, you can't get any better than this.
Reviews.Author: baligirl19

Reviews.Content: What a great place!!!!! What a great place to stay and what a sobering thought, in all the hustle and bustle of Kuta, walking out on to Legian St every day and passing the monument to those who lost their lives, we are so glad we stayed there.It has got to be the best 3 star hotel in Bali. Our family of 6 + 2 friends stayed in Sept 2005 for 2 weeks. Why go to Bali for less than that.My wife and I had a huge family room with a king size bed with 2 of our girls in the other room separated by sliding doors, right up on the top floor. Make sure you get the bellboys to carry some of your luggage.The rooms were all great and the bathroom was a good size but it looked like it had been left to fend for itself.The rest of the group stayed in standard twin rooms which was very comfortable accommodation for them. Don't try and get an extra bed in the room as it gets very squashed.The restaraunt/pool area is great but can get a bit crowded sometimes, depending on the amount of guests but generally, you have no trouble getting a table or deck chairs.You walk up an alley way to get to Legian St and it has numerous stalls along the way, which will give you better prices the more you get to know them and they don't mind you stopping for a talk.The hotel is situated centrally to Kuta  Legian and most places are within walking distance if you want to, but taxi's are cheap and a good way to travel. Pay by the meter, don't barter a price.We are hoping to go again in 2007 and if we do, we will definitely stay there. There wouldn't be a better value for money hotel in Bali.
Reviews.Author: OldMate

Reviews.Content: Great hotel I stayed at the dewi sri cottages in late dec 04 and would reccomend this place to anyone treavelling to bali and staying in kuta. Its in a central location and the beach is a 10 minute stroll. The staff were really freindly as were the guests. This hotel is ideal for anyone, while i was there there was a mix of families, couples and young adult groups. The price was excellent, there is a spa on site (massages, manicures etc...) the hotel also has a travel desk where u can book excursions and get picked up from the hotel reception and taken wherever you have booked in air conditioned mini bus. Room service rates are excellent and you can get food and drink around the clock here too. The hotel will also povide your transport back to the airport for a small fee, again in air conditioned mini bus. need i say more!!
Reviews.Author: Hails

Reviews.Content: Loved Dewi Sri Hi everyone who will be visiting Bali.My family and I with 2 friends[8] went to Bali for 2 weeks and stayed at The Dewi Sri Cottages.We would encourage anyone who is planning a trip,to stay there.The staff were wonderfull,and the family rooms were fantastic.The standard rooms were comfortable,but for 2 people only.We will be staying there again for 3 weeks this time.We loved it and are taking more with us this time.Enjoy your holidays.
Reviews.Author: caz_wa
